meta.article_title: March 2, 2020 - Drill the Fundamentals and the Specifics

debutant: Practice counterlooping with a forehand push-back- loop-counterloop drill
intermediaire: Work on recognizing and adapting to different arcs and spin types in loops

exercices_complementaires.description: Serve backspin, push it back, loop, and then counterloop; partner doesn't play out the point, instead reaches for a ball from a box.

metriques_progression: Work on practicing 3-5 reps of this drill
erreurs_a_eviter: Don't just practice counterlooping; work on recognizing and adapting to different arcs and spin types in loops
